title: Evidence Against Evidence Theory (?!)
abstract: This paper is concerned with the apparent greatest weakness of the Mathematical Theory of Evidence (MTE) of Shafer \cite{Shafer:76}, which has been strongly criticized by Wasserman \cite{Wasserman:92ijar} - the relationship to frequencies.
histories: 30 pages. arXiv admin note: substantial text overlap witharXiv:1704.04000
COMMENTS: 30 pages. arXiv admin note: substantial text overlap witharXiv:1704.04000
